pull_request.title: Errors not printed out when OPENSSL_NO_STDIO is set
pull_request.body: The handleErrors function should print out errors when OPENSSL_NO_STDIO is set. The ERR_clear_error function is called instead since ERR_print_errors_fp would empty the error queue.

review.body:
Thanks for this new image. Two small changes before I move them to "CI execution".
Oh, and you might actually also enable CI to completely run by moving the `docker login` step into the `when` (merging to "main") step, thus allowing CI to proceed without access to the docker credentials during build. Edit/Add: But of course this change would need to be done to all jobs :-/...
